data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alonso, Miguel, Kotov, Alexey (2017): A new species of Alonella Sars, 1862 (Crustacea: Cladocera: Chydoridae) from the Ecuadorian Andes. Zootaxa 4290 (3): 581-590, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4290.3.11|7 occurrences
